document.discussion_title: New York Army National Guard Recruiters On Hand For Founders Day In Auburn On August 13 (New York State Division of Military and Naval Affairs)
document.topic_text: ( Source : New York State Division of Military and Naval Affairs) AUBURN, NY (08/10/2016)(readMedia)-- Visitors to Auburn 's Founders Day events on Saturday, August 13, will be able to learn about opportunities in the New York Army
document.post: ( Source : New York State Division of Military and Naval Affairs) AUBURN, NY (08/10/2016)(readMedia)-- Visitors to Auburn 's Founders Day events on Saturday, August 13, will be able to learn about opportunities in the New York Army
